titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1564
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1564

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

tei:div.tei:message: Caught error exerr:EXXQDY0002: Error parsing XML. Document is not valid. Fatal (19,61) : The element type "supplied" must be terminated by the matching end-tag "</supplied>". Validated in -1 millisec. in document 1110000851.xml

Text preserved in this squeeze:
10.[... ... ... ...] 11.[... ... ... ...]
Restored text of this inscription:
1.[Biyadʾīl and ʿA-] 2.[mmīdharaʾ have staked out a legal claim through] 3.[the irrigation of their palm grove] 4.[associated with this] 5.[irrigation network,] 6.[according tot he judgment of] 7.[the council of ʿUraratu-] 8.[m (and) the irrigation-administrator Dādī-] 9.[ʾamar. The witnesses are:] 10.[Yadhmurʾīl] and 11.Muha[qīmum | ...]

Text preserved in this squeeze:
Restored text of this inscription:
Biyadʾīl and ʿA-
mmīdharaʾ have staked out a legal claim through
the irrigation of their palm grove
associated with this
irrigation network,
according tot he judgment of
the council of ʿUraratu-
m and the irrigation-administrator Dādī-
ʾamar. The witnesses are:
Yadhmurʾīl and
Muhaqīmum | ...
